1.0.name: wordpress/google-1-shortcodes
1.0.description:
Shortcodes for embedding Google +1 buttons. Currently, the plugin supports embedding +1 buttons using the following shortcodes: [gplusone], [plusone], [google+1], [g+1], [+1].

This plugin has been tested to work up to 3.4.2. Please contact me if you experience any problems with this plugin or have any questions.
